# Hedenfalk

## 2D

```{r}
df_2D_Hedenfalk = read.csv('./Real Dataset Distribution Data/2D_Hedenfalk.csv')
```

```{r, fig.width=12, fig.height=10}
Total_mass = 0.99
title = expression(paste(hat(G)({sigma[A]}^2, {sigma[B]}^2), ' of Hedenfalk Data (Threshold = 0.99)'))
plot_G_Hedenfalk = plotter_2D(Total_mass, df_2D_Hedenfalk, title)
plot_G_Hedenfalk
```

```{r}
#ggsave(filename = 'G(var1, var2) with Hedenfalk.jpg', plot = plot_G_Hedenfalk, width = 12, height = 10, dpi = 500)
```

## 1D

```{r}
df_1D_Hedenfalk = data.frame(x = df_2D_Hedenfalk$x/df_2D_Hedenfalk$y, prob = df_2D_Hedenfalk$prob)
```

```{r, fig.width=8, fig.height=6}
title = expression(paste(hat(G)({sigma[A]}^2/{sigma[B]}^2), ' of Hedenfalk Data'))
plot_1D_Hedenfalk = plotter_1D(df_1D_Hedenfalk, title)
plot_1D_Hedenfalk
```

```{r}
#ggsave(filename = 'G(lambda) of Hedenfalk.jpg', plot = plot_1D_Hedenfalk, width = 8, height = 6, dpi = 500)
```


# PBMC1

## Voom

### 2D

```{r}
df_2D_weighted_voom = read.csv('./Real Dataset Distribution Data/2D_weighted_voom.csv')
```

```{r, fig.width=12, fig.height=10}
Total_mass = 0.99
title = expression(paste(hat(G)({sigma[A]}^2, {sigma[B]}^2), ' based on Weights Estimated by Voom (Threshold = 0.99)'))
plot_G_voom = plotter_2D(Total_mass, df_2D_weighted_voom, title)
plot_G_voom
```

```{r}
#ggsave(filename = 'G(var1, var2) with Voom.jpg', plot = plot_G_voom, width = 12, height = 10, dpi = 500)
```

### 1D

```{r}
df_lambda = data.frame(x = df_2D_weighted_voom$x/df_2D_weighted_voom$y, prob = df_2D_weighted_voom$prob)
```

```{r, fig.width=8, fig.height=6}
title = expression(paste(hat(G)({sigma[A]}^2/{sigma[B]}^2), ' based on Weights estimated by Voom'))
plot_1D_voom = plotter_1D(df_lambda, title)
plot_1D_voom
```

```{r}
#ggsave(filename = 'G(lambda) by Voom.jpg', plot = plot_1D_voom, width = 8, height = 6, dpi = 500)
```
